alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Oneida; Southern Marinette County; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 3:12PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...ICY PATCHES POSSIBLE ON SOME ROADS, SIDEWALKS, AND PARKING LOTS IN NORTH-CENTRAL AND FAR NORTHEAST WISCONSIN LATE TONIGHT INTO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... Scattered light precipitation will continue across much of northern Wisconsin tonight. The precipitation should fall as mainly rain, though some freezing rain or a wintry mix could occur late tonight into early Tuesday morning. As a result, icy patches could develop on untreated roads until later Tuesday morning, at which point the ground should warm above freezing. Anyone heading outdoors or traveling across the area late tonight or early Tuesday morning should be alert for the possibility of icy patches on untreated roads, sidewalks, and parking lots. Use extra caution, and allow some extra time to reach your destination.
